Vanessa Pereira


6+ years working on electronic health records specifications and functional analysis, with international experience.
Possess a MSc in Medical Informatics by FMUP.

Currently working as
- Digital health engineer @Luxembourg Institute of Health.
- Consultant & clinical data modeller @Better.

"The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud."

I believe quality and well structured health data saves lifes. And I fight for it, everyday.
